mapper.select: SELECT community.id, sector, title, LEFT(content, 50) AS content, file_id AS filedId, user_id AS userId, write_date AS writeDate, views, likes, username FROM community, user WHERE community.user_id = user.id ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT community.id, sector, title, content, file_id AS filedId, user_id AS userId, write_date AS writeDate, views, likes, username FROM community, user WHERE community.user_id = user.id AND community.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community (sector, title, content, file_id, user_id, write_date, views, likes) VALUE (#{sector}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, #{userId}, NOW(), 0, 0)
